At the current location, if the roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?

B. I cannot see the roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road, but I see a parking lot with many cars on the left side of my field of vision.  
C. I cannot see the roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road, but I see a seven-story building on the left side of my field of vision.  
D. I cannot see the roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road, but I see a construction site with many trucks in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
E. I cannot see the roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road, but I see the facade of a modern high-rise building in the upper right corner of my field of vision.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The roof of the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road is not within the field of view. However, a seven-story building is visible on the left side of the field of vision, which matches the description in option C. Options A, B, D, and E do not accurately describe the presence of a seven-story building in the current field of view.
